description: In the image, there is a man sitting at a table with a cup of coffee in front of him. He is holding a piece of paper and using a pen to write on it. The man is positioned with his back to the camera, and the table is placed in the center of the room. The man is performing the action of writing on the paper with the pen, possibly taking notes or writing a message. The presence of the cup of coffee suggests that the man might be taking a break or enjoying a moment of relaxation while writing.

In the image, there is a man sitting at a dining table, holding a cup of coffee and a piece of paper. He is also holding a small white box, which might contain a sponge or a cleaning tool. The man is positioned in front of a white tablecloth, which is likely on a dining table. He is performing the action of cleaning the table, possibly using the sponge or cleaning tool from the small white box. The presence of the cup of coffee suggests that the man might be taking a break or preparing to clean the table while enjoying his coffee.
